item.desc: 根据警员编号查询详细信息
item.sql: SELECT pbd_cus_number, pbd_user_id AS id, pbd_police_id AS policeid, pbd_police_name AS name, pbd_pstn_name, pbd_sex, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') - TO_CHAR(pbd_birth_date, 'YYYY') AS pbd_age, pbd_political_status, pbd_official_title, TO_CHAR(pbd_birth_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS pbd_birth_date, pbd_fixed_phone, pbd_ip_phone, pbd_phone, pbd_short_phone, pbd_fax, pbd_talk_num, pbd_email, pbd_oa_system, pbd_police_cmmnct, pbd_family_phone, pbd_police_type_indc, pbd_degree_indc, pbd_profession, TO_CHAR(pbd_job_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS pbd_job_date, pbd_img, pbd_remark, odd_name FROM plc_police_base_dtls LEFT JOIN sys_org_dept_dtls ON (odd_id = pbd_drptmnt_id)

item.desc: 根据警号查询进出监信息
item.sql: SELECT pir_police_id, pir_bsns_date, TO_CHAR(pir_bsns_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS pir_bsns_time, pir_inout_flag FROM plc_police_inout_record

item.desc: 根据警员编号(数据库seq)查询刷卡信息
item.sql: SELECT TO_CHAR(scr_bsns_time,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS scr_bsns_time, dbd_name, scr_inout_flag, scr_record_id, scr_door_id FROM dor_swipe_card_record LEFT JOIN dor_door_card_dtls ON (dcd_door_card_id = scr_card_id) LEFT JOIN dor_door_base_dtls ON (scr_door_id = dbd_id)

item.desc: 根据警号查询成就信息
查询民警，(门禁卡管理 ,rfid数据绑定)使用
item.sql: SELECT pbd_user_id as person_id, pbd_police_id as number_id, pbd_police_name as person_name FROM PLC_POLICE_BASE_DTLS
